name: Greek Inspired Ratatouille

ingredients.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning or Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning

preparation: Combine first three ingredients in a Rectangular Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 10 minutes.
Mix in lemon juice and olive oil. Season to taste.
tips: Serve as a side dish with roast or grilled meat, or spoon over steamed rice or warm pasta.

products.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning (Pkg of 3)
summary: A Greek-inspired meal, souvlaki is marinated meat grilled on a skewer, often served with warm pita bread and tzatziki. No grill? No problem. Skip the skewers and put your Sheet Pan to work to make equally tasty Chicken Souvlaki in 20 minutes in the oven.

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kin —free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
